title: Staff of Cherished Necromancy
content:

BG3 Staff of Cherished Necromancy Information

Heightened Necromaney: Creatures have Disadvantage on Saving Throus against your Necromancy spells. Life Essence Harvest: When the wielder kills a hostile creature with a spell, they greedily absorb its energy and gain Life Essence until their next Long Rest. Range: 1.5m
